findings.title: QSP-13 Zero-Value Transfers
findings.description: It is currently possible to withdraw or request the redemption of the zero amount.

findings.title: Lack of documentation on the Admin Fee implementation in the white paper
findings.description: The white paper lacks documentation on the Admin Fee implementation.

findings.title: Lack of documentation on the note adapter implementation in the white paper
findings.description: The white paper lacks documentation on the note adapter implementation.

findings.title: System is only compatible with ERC20 tokens with 18 decimals
findings.description: The system has a limitation where it can only work with ERC20 tokens that have 18 decimals.

findings.title: Loan Default : Could not find the exact corresponding code
findings.description: The code for Loan Default is not present in the scope.

findings.title: Collateral Value : There is no corresponding code
findings.description: The documentation mentions Collateral Value but there is no corresponding code found in the scope.

findings.title: Sell Note shows some discrepancies: Validate loan purchase price is greater than minimum purchase price
findings.description: The sellNote function lacks validation of loan purchase price being greater than the minimum purchase price.

findings.title: Validate Vault has sufficient cash for purchase
findings.description: Unclear whether it is expected to be `purchasePrice > _totalCashBalance` or `purchasePrice >= _totalCashBalance`.

findings.title: Validate Senior Tranche Return is less than loan return was not found in the code
findings.description: Admin fees are only applicable to successful loan repayments, but the adminFeeRate has not been factored out of the seniorTrancheReturn on unsuccessful loan repayments.
